p: Grey literature, PubMed and Scopus were searched for relevant documents published in the past 15 years using the following search terms: (exit screening OR entry screening OR border measure) AND (patient OR ill OR sick OR infected OR affected OR exposed OR symptomatic) AND (human OR passenger OR traveler OR traveler OR crew) AND (airport OR aerodrome OR airdrome OR seaport OR port OR point of entry OR port of entry).
